text: I am Jose a green shoe I'm a director
within the European investment fund gif
is a European institution part of the IB
group will be an investment bank and we
support SMEs SMEs being small and medium
enterprises we facilitate financing for
them some time ago we started a project
and the aim of the project is to show
where the EU money goes we have done
this project in collaboration with
several entities one of them was Awas
that provide the necessary
infrastructure to roll out the website
that demonstrates where financing is
going across Europe the main
characteristics of the solution that
we're looking for was fundamentally an
efficient and resilient solution we
consider that the platform that is put
in place offers exactly that so in a
certain way we could do it in a short
amount of time we can grow it when we
need and on the other way we we are sure
there's enough resilient for the thing
to stand up in the most adverse
situations we just went forward which
appear to us to be the most effective
solution overall which was using the
cloud infrastructure
you
